name: The Curse of Loonies
description:
You moved to this town a year ago and the people in the town were evil. You wanted to move to another town, but you did not have enough money to do it. In one night you could not sleep, so you went out to breathe fresh air, but something happened...

All people were like if they didn't have any soul or any evidence of thinking. They want only one thing...

THEY WANT YOU DEAD !!! And not only them. There are a lot more bloodthirsty enemies who are not people and want you dead.

But there is something, that control them...

Are you ready to discover what happened in the town?

- Medieval Horror-Fantasy World Waiting Only For You

- 10 Weapons You Can Not Survive Without

- 19 Types of Strong Enemies Which Can't Be Defeated Easily

- Epic Boss Fights

- 10-30 Hours of Immersive Gameplay

- 13 Locations Full of Enemies

- Original Sound Track For Each Location

- 3 Different Endings

If you encounter any bugs, write it to me please.

Minimum Requirements

CPU: Intel Pentium E6300 Dual-Core 2.80 GHz

RAM: 4GB

GPU: nVidia GeForce 9600 GT 512 MB

HDD: 3GB

Peripherials: Mouse, Keyboard

DirectX: 9c

Recommended Requirements

CPU: Intel Core i5 2500K 3.3 GHz

RAM: 6GB

GPU: nVidia GeForce GTX 760 3GB

HDD: 3GB

Peripherials: Mouse, Keyboard

SoundCard: Any

DirectX: 10
